attributes.action: Stop another referendum for the EU and get article 50 underway
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron promised that whatever the outcome he would support our decision. He is not. He is trying to delay the process and anger Brussels. We need a swift and amicable exit.
attributes.background: We have voted to LEAVE the EU now members of parlament are wanting to go against our requests. Remain voters are trying for another referendum. This has to stop. The British people have spoken and the government need to listen. Article 50 needs to be presented to Brussels
